data.prayer: Father, encourage the 38,536 believers in Putumayo to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Putumayo, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Putumayo, Colombia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Putumayo, Colombia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Putumayo, Colombia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Passe people.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 359,100 people living in Putumayo.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 359,100 people living in the state of Putumayo.
Spirit, teach the 38,536 believers in the state of Putumayo the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

location.name: Putumayo
location.cities_list: Puerto Asís, Mocoa, Orito, Valle del Guamuez, Sibundoy
location.cities_list_w_pop: Puerto Asís (29,782), Mocoa (22,035), Orito (13,708), Valle del Guamuez (9,969), Sibundoy (9,458)
